item.title: How I Use Anki
item.description: Getting started with Anki can be a daunting task. In this post I will show you my Anki configuration.

item.title: How I Read Documentation and Grammar Books
item.description: Boring technical texts are hard to read. Albeit, they contain information that is necessary to know for many reasons.
